casebody.data:
O & M INDUSTRIES
v.
SMITH ENGINEERING. No. 502PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. T. Paul Hendrick, Winston-Salem, for O & M Industries. Harry R. Bivens, Rolly L. Chambers, Michael Knapp, Charlotte, for Kurz Transfer Products. James R. Vann, Raleigh, Nan E. Hannah, Cary, for Southeastern Asso. of Credit Mgt. L. Holmes Eleazer, Jr., Charlotte, Fenton T. Erwin, Jr., for American Subcontractors Asso.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of August 2005 by Plaintiff to Strike Appellee's Appendix:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
